description.displayText: Nia is the best! She was always on time, helped our daughter with homework, took her to practices if we were running late from work. She was also usually available at last minute times. She was super flexible, as both myself and bf work retail. If we hadn't moved, she would still be our babysitter! We would hire her back in a heartbeat!
description.originalText: Nia is the best! She was always on time, helped our daughter with homework, took her to practices if we were running late from work. She was also usually available at last minute times. She was super flexible, as both myself and bf work retail. If we hadn't moved, she would still be our babysitter! We would hire her back in a heartbeat!

description.displayText: Nia has a natural way of connecting with children. I have not only seen her engage this way with her younger sister but with other children as well. She plays an essential role as my right hand with my younger daughter since I am a single parent and have needed her help. I am very comfortable trusting her with the care of my younger daughter and as well as other children. She is very aware of children's needs and is very good at entertaining them while ensuring their safety.
